mapper.insert: insert into reserve(scno, id, checkin, checkout, request, userName, userTel) values(#{scno}, #{id}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{request}, #{userName}, #{userTel})

WHERE A.isDelete = 0 and (A.sccate='유치원' or A.sccate='호텔') group by scno ) t WHERE t.cnt < 10
